setup-worktree: if [ ! -f .clasp.json ] && [ -f .clasp.json.example ]; then cp .clasp.json.example .clasp.json && echo '‚úÖ Created .clasp.json from example (update scriptId if needed)'; fi
if [ ! -f .env ] && [ -f .env.example ]; then cp .env.example .env && echo '‚úÖ Created .env from example'; fi
if [ -f .clasp.json ] && [ -f .env ]; then echo '‚úÖ Configuration files ready'; fi
if [ ! -f ~/.clasprc.json ]; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Not authenticated with Google. Run "npm run clasp:login" when ready'; else echo '‚úÖ Google authentication found'; fi
